skill_e.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.6) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for 1 second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by ? seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

skill_i.tooltip: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

skill_q.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after 4 seconds, the cask will explode, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.7) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.

The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds. Deals 70% damage to minions.

skill_r.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take ? (+0.8) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.

skill_w.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking 10/12/14/16/18% (+?%) reduced damage for 2.5 seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.6) plus 7% of their max Health (max 300 vs monsters).
